text: smart and simple tips for growing your
small business the opportunity to
interact with your customers is what
makes social media such a powerful tool
for small businesses but the key to
truly engaging your audience is
surprisingly simple start a conversation
that your customers can take part in
it's easy to think of Facebook Twitter
and other sites as no more than a place
to advertise your business but social
media engagement like actual
conversation requires a two-way dialogue
a back and forth instead of posting an
information heavy ad try asking a
question that encourages followers to
respond and then keep the conversation
going by answering these responses you
can use this input to make decisions
that result in your customers feeling
heard and more invested in your small
business another great idea post fun
funny or meaningful photos of your
business in action and encourage
followers to share photos of their own
your your customers will love knowing
they're interacting with a real person
and they'll be eager to help promote
your business by sharing with
others and there's your quick win
